Avoid using UPDATE and DELETE without WHERE condition
Avoid using database hints
Avoid using CHECK, EXIT,or RETURN in SELECT ... ENDSELECT loops
Avoid unsorted data after SELECT queries
Beans with normal scope must be proxyable to avoid runtime errors
Subscripts and iterators must be defined with BINARY usage
Prefer using indexes instead of subscripts
Avoid using INITIALIZE statement on data structures
Avoid calling programs statically
Avoid artifacts having Incorrect Type Conversion or Cast
Avoid using Parse for primitive types and use TryParse instead
Avoid having transaction with the Thread.Sleep method in a loop
Avoid using GC.Collect()
Persistent classes should implement GetHashCode() and Equals()
Runtime Resource Management Control Element in a Component Built to Run on Application Servers
Check PCB status code after DLI queries
CICS return code should be checked
Expired or Released Resource should not be used(CWE-672)
Avoid numerical data corruption during incompatible mutation
Content type should be checked when receiving a HTTP Post(CWE-434)
Avoid using deprecated method, constructor, field, type or package
CWE-798: Use of hard-coded credentials
Avoid using hard-coded values
CWE-501: Trust boundary violation
CWE-614: Sensitive cookie in HTTPS session without 'Secure' attribute
CWE-330: Use of insufficiently random values
Avoid having lock on this object
All types of a serializable class must be serializable
PeopleSoft: Page fields using views must be display only
PeopleSoft: Avoid inserting or deleting data on grid based on a record view
PeopleSoft: Avoid disabling insert or delete on grid based on a record table
PeopleSoft: Avoid using the SqlExec statements in the PeopleCode
PeopleSoft: Record field based on XLAT should be defined as "Translate Table Edit"
PeopleSoft: Message item must have a translation into another language
PeopleSoft: XLAT item must have a translation into another language
PeopleSoft: Field label item must have a translation into another language
PeopleSoft: Menu label must have a translation into another language
PeopleSoft: Number of substitution joker for message text must be equal
PeopleSoft: Avoid deleting delivered values in standard XLAT
PeopleSoft: Never delete a field from a standard panel
PeopleSoft: Do NOT delete PeopleSoft defined fields from a record.
PeopleSoft: All new Translate value shoud be at dd/mm/yyyy
PeopleSoft: Never remove a standard page from component
PeopleSoft: Avoid modification on lenghts or types on Field
PeopleSoft: Avoid renaming or changing attributes on existing projet's Fields
PeopleSoft: Avoid PeopleCode Event with High Cyclomatic
PeopleSoft: Avoid PeopleCode Functions with High Cyclomatic
PeopleSoft: Avoid PeopleCode Methods with High Cyclomatic
PeopleSoft: Avoid PeopleCode Classes with High Cyclomatic
PeopleSoft: Don't use hardscode message
PeopleSoft: Avoid unfilled Field Label
PeopleSoft: Avoid put PeopleCode into Fields, prefer Component Level
PeopleSoft: Write UNION ALL instead of UNION statement
PeopleSoft: Avoid using comments in SQL queries
PeopleSoft: Avoid use the Hints to force Oracle to use a specific access method
PeopleSoft: Avoid using count(*) syntax
PeopleSoft: Avoid using ROWNUM and ORDER BY
PeopleSoft: In an INSERT statement define explicitly the values for all the table columns
PeopleSoft: Child records must share all keys as the parent record, plus one or more keys that uniquely identify each row.
PeopleSoft: Related Language tables must have the same key structure as the table with the addition of the field LANGUAGE_CD.
PeopleSoft: Avoid creating unused Field label
PeopleSoft: Naming convention on Search Record
PeopleSoft: Naming convention on Language Record Table
PeopleSoft: Naming convention on Language Record View
PeopleSoft: Naming convention on AE State Record
PeopleSoft: Naming convention on AE Temporary Record

PeopleSoft: Naming convention suffix on Record Derived
PeopleSoft: Avoid too many Related displays
PeopleSoft: Avoid unlimited occurs on grids
PeopleSoft : Create all new Record Table in a specific tablespace
PeopleSoft: Create all new Record Temp in a specific tablespace
PeopleSoft: Avoid tables having indexes with a too large index definition
PeopleSoft: Avoid disabling Deferred Processing on Fields
PeopleSoft: Avoid disabling Deferred Processing on Pages
PeopleSoft: Avoid disabling Deferred Processing on Components
PeopleSoft: Using DISTINCT, GROUP BY or UNION clause in a View implies that no join using an index can be done on this View.
PeopleSoft: All record must have at least one column as key
PeopleSoft: All keys should be located at the top of the record definition, and listed in order of importance.
PeopleSoft: All select statement must list each field specifically
PeopleSoft: Use as possible SQL section rather than PeopleCode in the application engine
PeopleSoft: Always prefer joining tables to subqueries
PeopleSoft: Use the DISTINCT clause only when we are sure that the query will return duplicate results
PeopleSoft: Prefer using UNION to the OR operator.
PeopleSoft: SELECT ... FROM ... WHERE alias.col LIKE '%xxx'
PeopleSoft: Prefer boolean operators (EXISTS, NOT EXISTS) and non-negative predicates
PeopleSoft: IN vs EXIST Use IN when the subquery is the most selective
PeopleSoft: Use TRUNCATE statement to clean a whole table
PeopleSoft: For complex query, always prefer the subqueries to retrieve display fields not used as joins search criterias
PeopleSoft: Avoid SQL with queries on more than 4 Tables
PeopleSoft: Avoid SQL using GROUP BY
PeopleSoft: Avoid PeopleCode using GROUP BY
PeopleSoft: Avoid SQL using HAVING
PeopleSoft: Avoid PeopleCode using HAVING
PeopleSoft: Component includes only page and never subpage (SBP) or secondary-page
PeopleSoft: Non-Standard SQL Table Name must be empty for a Record Table
PeopleSoft: Non-Standard SQL Table Name must be empty for a Record View
PeopleSoft: Non-Standard SQL Table Name must be empty for a Record Query View
PeopleSoft: New field added in a standard record must be at the end of the record
PeopleSoft: All new Record must have a SYNCID
PeopleSoft: Ensure that "Buid sequence N§" is upper than "Build sequence N°" of all view used in is definition.
PeopleSoft: All functions written will use the PeopleCode type of FieldFormula
PeopleSoft: New field added in a standard record must be done in a specific KEY sub-record

PeopleSoft: Avoid PeopleCode Functions with a low comment/code ratio

PeopleSoft: Avoid PeopleCode Classes with a low comment/code ratio

PeopleSoft: Avoid undocumented PeopleCode Classes

PeopleSoft: Pages should be designed assuming the user has an 800x600 monitor resolution
PeopleSoft: Developers should avoid developing web pages that result in horizontal scrolling
PeopleSoft: Developers should not build long pages that are longer than 5 pages
PeopleSoft: Avoid use a radio button or check box when the user has more than three choices
PeopleSoft: Use Default Style and Font
PeopleSoft: Key fields displayed on a panel should ALWAYS be display only
PeopleSoft: Attribute No colon should be check for visible label
PeopleSoft: Avoid specific visual design for grid
PeopleSoft: Display control field must be before the related display field that depend on it
PeopleSoft: Display and related fields from same record must be avoid
PeopleSoft: All records with SETID in its key, must be linked to a record group.
PeopleSoft: Only one long character type field is allowed in a regular record definition.
PeopleSoft: Use DESCR and DESCRSHORT for description fields rather than record specific titles
